thread.title: Sheriff's Office: Man kills mother, self in Sun Lakes murder-suicide
thread.title_full: Sheriff's Office: Man kills mother, self in Sun Lakes murder-suicide

author: Diego Mendoza-Moyers , The Republic | azcentral.com
title: Sheriff's Office: Man kills mother, self in Sun Lakes murder-suicide
text:
Shooting (Photo: azcentral.com) 
73 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE The bodies of two people were found in a Sun Lakes home on Saturday in what authorities believe was a murder-suicide.
Lori Peeples, 62, and Brent McClain, 34, were found dead in the home after McClain fatally shot Peeples and then himself, a Maricopa County Sheriff's Office spokesman said.
The Sheriff's Office said Peeples is the mother of McClain, and the two lived together in the home, just southeast of Phoenix.
No other information was provided, and the investigation is ongoing, the Sheriff's Office said.
